text: Abdul Kahir Chowdhury is a Bangladeshi politician. He was elected a Member of Parliament for the Bangladesh Nationalist Party in Sylhet-5 (Kanaighat- Zakiganj) constituency in the February 1996 Bangladeshi general election. He is currently the president of Sylhet District BNP."List of 6th Parliament Members" (PDF). Bangladesh Parliament (in Bengali). title: Abdul Kahir Chowdhury
